title: 1 bowl chocolate cake
ingredients: ['400g caster sugar', '225g plain flour', '65g best quality cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '250ml milk', '125ml vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250ml boiling water']
